title: 1663-D
statement: D. Is it rated - 3time limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputInputThe first line contains a string $$$S$$$.The second line contains an integer $$$X$$$.Constraints$$$|S|=3$$$$$$0 \\le X \\le 10^9$$$The input is guaranteed to be valid.

processed.result: You are given a string  $S$ of length 3 and an integer $X$.  What is the problem?
You are given a 3-letter word and a number.  Determine if the word can be repeated  $X$ times to form a longer word.
